subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: If anyone can whip a team into form on short notice, it is the man known around the soccer world simply as Bora. He is the only coach to take five different teams to the World Cup.
snippet: If anyone can whip a team into form on short notice, it is the man known around the soccer world simply as Bora. He is the only coach to take five different teams to the World Cup.
